revised_title: Dynamical Equations and Normal Integrals: Applications in Motion and Rotation
tldr: The author presents a method to transform a system of differential equations into a specific form, allowing for the discovery of "normal integrals" and "normal elements." This method is applied to problems involving the motion of a material point under a central force and the rotation of a solid body. The author also discusses the relationship between their work and previous research by Hamilton, Jacobi, and Cayley.
